headline: TomTom and Uber strengthen ties to enhance on-demand travel experiences globally
summary: TomTom and Uber strengthen ties to enhance on-demand travel experiences globally TomTom and Uber strengthen ties to enhance on-demand travel experiences globally AMSTERDAM, Netherlands, Jan. 06, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- TomTom (TOM2), the specialist in mapping and location technology, and Uber Technologies, Inc. (NYSE: UBER) have renewed their partnership to integrate TomTom’s maps, Maps APIs and live services across Uber’s global platform. The integration of TomTom’s maps and Maps APIs enhances
